channel.title: Need a tut for rune defender
channel.description: need a tut for a rune defender all the other do nothing for me just to make it go in same hand with wep but u can wield the wep while u have the dag on

item.title: Need a tut for rune defender
item.dc:creator: @zdiddy1 -zdiddy-
item.description:
@zdiddy1 wrote:

Travis_02:

umm u dont know what ur talking about… ive seen them there rune daggers that go in same hand with ur wep…

Of course he does. And anyway you could’ve edited your topic post to show that you wanted rune daggers and not proper rune defenders.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a tut for rune defender
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Search this in item.java public static int shields It should look like this public static int shields[] = {3101,1213,7332,7334,1171,1173,1175,1177,1179,1181,1183,1185,1187,1189,1191,1193,1195,1197,1199,1201,1540,2589,2597,2603,2611,2621,2629,2659,2667,2675,2890,3122,3488,3758,3839,3840,3841,3842,3843,3844,4072,4156,4224,4225,4226,4227,4228,4229,4230,4231,4232,4233,4234,4302,4507,4512,6215,6217,6219,6221,6223,6225,6227,6229,6231,6233,6235,6237,6239,6241,6243,6245,6247,6249,6251,6253,6255,6257,6259,6261,6263,6265,6267,6269,6271,6273,6275,6277,6279,6524};

Add this at the end of the last number before the ‘}’ and ‘;’.

,6889
Travis_02:

umm u dont know what ur talking about… ive seen them there rune daggers that go in same hand with ur wep…

He does know what he’s talking about. -fedexer- is a legend. Have some respect.

Read full topic
